017package org.apache.commons.chain.web.portlet;
018
019import java.util.Collections;
020import java.util.Map;
021
022import javax.portlet.PortletContext;
023import javax.portlet.PortletRequest;
024import javax.portlet.PortletResponse;
025import javax.servlet.http.Cookie;
026
027import org.apache.commons.chain.web.WebContext;
028import org.apache.commons.chain.web.WebContextBase;
029
030/**
031 * Concrete implementation of {@link WebContext} suitable for use in
032 * portlets. The abstract methods are mapped to the appropriate
033 * collections of the underlying portlet context, request, and response
034 * instances that are passed to the constructor (or the initialize method).
035 *
036 * @author Craig R. McClanahan
037 * @version $Revision$ $Date$
038 */
039public class PortletWebContext extends WebContextBase {
040    private static final long serialVersionUID = 7590757017994210786L;
041
042    // ------------------------------------------------------------ Constructors
043
044    /**
045     * Construct an uninitialized {@link PortletWebContext} instance.
046     */
047    public PortletWebContext() {
048    }
049
050    /**
051     * Construct a {@link PortletWebContext} instance that is initialized
052     * with the specified Portlet API objects.
053     *
054     * @param context The {@code PortletContext} for this web application
055     * @param request The {@code PortletRequest} for this request
056     * @param response The {@code PortletResponse} for this request
057     */
058    public PortletWebContext(PortletContext context,
059                             PortletRequest request,
060                             PortletResponse response) {
061
062        initialize(context, request, response);
063    }
064
065    // ------------------------------------------------------ Instance Variables
066
067    /**
068     * The lazily instantiated {@code Map} of application scope
069     * attributes.
070     */
071    private transient Map<String, Object> applicationScope = null;
072
073    /**
074     * The {@code PortletContext} for this web application.
075     */
076    private transient PortletContext context = null;
077
078    /**
079     * The lazily instantiated {@code Map} of header name-value
080     * combinations (immutable).
081     */
082    private transient Map<String, String> header = null;
083
084    /**
085     * The lazily instantiated {@code Map} of header name-values
086     * combinations (immutable).
087     */
088    private transient Map<String, String[]> headerValues = null;
089
090    /**
091     * The lazily instantiated {@code Map} of context initialization
092     * parameters.
093     */
094    private transient Map<String, String> initParam = null;
095
096    /**
097     * The lazily instantiated {@code Map} of cookies.
098     */
099    private transient Map<String, Cookie> cookieValues = null;
100
101    /**
102     * The lazily instantiated {@code Map} of request
103     * parameter name-value.
104     */
105    private transient Map<String, String> param = null;
106
107    /**
108     * The lazily instantiated {@code Map} of request
109     * parameter name-values.
110     */
111    private transient Map<String, String[]> paramValues = null;
112
113    /**
114     * The {@code PortletRequest} for this request.
115     */
116    private transient PortletRequest request = null;
117
118    /**
119     * The lazily instantiated {@code Map} of request scope
120     * attributes.
121     */
122    private transient Map<String, Object> requestScope = null;
123
124    /**
125     * The {@code PortletResponse} for this request.
126     */
127    private transient PortletResponse response = null;
128
129    /**
130     * The lazily instantiated {@code Map} of session scope
131     * attributes.
132     */
133    private transient Map<String, Object> sessionScope = null;
134
135    // ---------------------------------------------------------- Public Methods
136
137    /**
138     * Return the {@link PortletContext} for this context.
139     *
140     * @return The {@code PortletContext} for this request
141     */
142    public PortletContext getContext() {
143        return this.context;
144    }
145
146    /**
147     * Return the {@link PortletRequest} for this context.
148     *
149     * @return The {@code PortletRequest} for this context.
150     */
151    public PortletRequest getRequest() {
152        return this.request;
153    }
154
155    /**
156     * Return the {@link PortletResponse} for this context.
157     *
158     * @return The {@code PortletResponse} for this context.
159     */
160    public PortletResponse getResponse() {
161        return this.response;
162    }
163
164    /**
165     * Initialize (or reinitialize) this {@link PortletWebContext} instance
166     * for the specified Portlet API objects.
167     *
168     * @param context The {@code PortletContext} for this web application
169     * @param request The {@code PortletRequest} for this request
170     * @param response The {@code PortletResponse} for this request
171     */
172    public void initialize(PortletContext context,
173                           PortletRequest request,
174                           PortletResponse response) {
175
176        // Save the specified Portlet API object references
177        this.context = context;
178        this.request = request;
179        this.response = response;
180
181        // Perform other setup as needed
182    }
183
184    /**
185     * Release references to allocated resources acquired in
186     * {@code initialize()} of via subsequent processing. After this
187     * method is called, subsequent calls to any other method than
188     * {@code initialize()} will return undefined results.
189     */
190    public void release() {
191        // Release references to allocated collections
192        applicationScope = null;
193        header = null;
194        headerValues = null;
195        initParam = null;
196        param = null;
197        paramValues = null;
198        cookieValues = null;
199        requestScope = null;
200        sessionScope = null;
201
202        // Release references to Portlet API objects
203        context = null;
204        request = null;
205        response = null;
206    }
207
208    // ------------------------------------------------------ WebContext Methods
209
210    /**
211     * See the {@link WebContext}'s Javadoc.
212     *
213     * @return Application scope Map.
214     */
215    @Override
216    public Map<String, Object> getApplicationScope() {
217        if (applicationScope == null && context != null) {
218            applicationScope = new PortletApplicationScopeMap(context);
219        }
220        return applicationScope;
221    }
222
223    /**
224     * See the {@link WebContext}'s Javadoc.
225     *
226     * @return Header values Map.
227     */
228    @Override
229    public Map<String, String> getHeader() {
230        if (header == null && request != null) {
231            // header = new PortletHeaderMap(request);
232            header = Collections.emptyMap();
233        }
234        return header;
235    }
236
237    /**
238     * See the {@link WebContext}'s Javadoc.
239     *
240     * @return Header values Map.
241     */
242    @Override
243    public Map<String, String[]> getHeaderValues() {
244        if (headerValues == null && request != null) {
245            // headerValues = new PortletHeaderValuesMap(request);
246            headerValues = Collections.emptyMap();
247        }
248        return headerValues;
249    }
250
251    /**
252     * See the {@link WebContext}'s Javadoc.
253     *
254     * @return Initialization parameter Map.
255     */
256    @Override
257    public Map<String, String> getInitParam() {
258        if (initParam == null && context != null) {
259            initParam = new PortletInitParamMap(context);
260        }
261        return initParam;
262    }
263
264    /**
265     * See the {@link WebContext}'s Javadoc.
266     *
267     * @return Request parameter Map.
268     */
269    @Override
270    public Map<String, String> getParam() {
271        if (param == null && request != null) {
272            param = new PortletParamMap(request);
273        }
274        return param;
275    }
276
277    /**
278     * See the {@link WebContext}'s Javadoc.
279     *
280     * @return Request parameter Map.
281     */
282    @Override
283    public Map<String, String[]> getParamValues() {
284        if (paramValues == null && request != null) {
285            paramValues = new PortletParamValuesMap(request);
286        }
287        return paramValues;
288    }
289
290    /**
291     * See the {@link WebContext}'s Javadoc.
292     *
293     * @return Map of Cookies.
294     * @since Chain 1.1
295     */
296    @Override
297    public Map<String, Cookie> getCookies() {
298        if (cookieValues == null && request != null) {
299            cookieValues = new PortletCookieMap(request);
300        }
301        return cookieValues;
302    }
303
304    /**
305     * See the {@link WebContext}'s Javadoc.
306     *
307     * @return Request scope Map.
308     */
309    @Override
310    public Map<String, Object> getRequestScope() {
311        if (requestScope == null && request != null) {
312            requestScope = new PortletRequestScopeMap(request);
313        }
314        return requestScope;
315    }
316
317    /**
318     * See the {@link WebContext}'s Javadoc.
319     *
320     * @return Session scope Map.
321     */
322    @Override
323    public Map<String, Object> getSessionScope() {
324        if (sessionScope == null && request != null) {
325            sessionScope = new PortletSessionScopeMap(request);
326        }
327        return sessionScope;
328    }
329}
